select rnum, bno, content, writer_id, case when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') < to_char(regdate + 1/(24*60), 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))*24*60*60)))||'초전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') < to_char(regdate + 1/24, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))*24*60)))||'분전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') < to_char(regdate + 1, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'))*24)))||'시간전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd') < to_char(regdate + 7, 'yyyy/mm/dd') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')))))||'일전' else to_char(regdate, 'yyyy"년"MM"월"dd"일"') end regdate from ( select rownum as rnum, A.* from ( select * from board where del_chk = 'N'
and ${search_option} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
order by bno desc) A
where rownum <= (#{page}+1)*20) x where rnum > #{page}*20

select rnum, bno, content, writer_id, case when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') < to_char(regdate + 1/(24*60), 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))*24*60*60)))||'초전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') < to_char(regdate + 1/24, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))*24*60)))||'분전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') < to_char(regdate + 1, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'))*24)))||'시간전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd') < to_char(regdate + 7, 'yyyy/mm/dd') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')))))||'일전' else to_char(regdate, 'yyyy"년"MM"월"dd"일"') end regdate from ( select rownum as rnum, A.* from ( select * from (select * from board where del_chk = 'N') b where writer_id = #{id} or writer_id in (select t_id from follow where m_id = #{id}) order by b.bno desc) A where rownum <= (#{page}+1)*20) x where rnum > #{page}*20

select rnum, bno, content, writer_id, case when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') < to_char(regdate + 1/(24*60), 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))*24*60*60)))||'초전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') < to_char(regdate + 1/24, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))*24*60)))||'분전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') < to_char(regdate + 1, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'))*24)))||'시간전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd') < to_char(regdate + 7, 'yyyy/mm/dd') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')))))||'일전' else to_char(regdate, 'yyyy"년"MM"월"dd"일"') end regdate from(select rownum as rnum, A.* from ( select * from board b where writer_id = #{id} and b.del_chk = 'N'
and not exists (select f.bno from board_file f where f.bno = b.bno)
and exists (select f.bno from board_file f where f.bno = b.bno)
order by b.bno desc ) A
where rownum <= (#{page}+1)*20) x where rnum > #{page}*20

select rnum, bno, content, writer_id, case when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') < to_char(regdate + 1/(24*60), 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))*24*60*60)))||'초전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') < to_char(regdate + 1/24, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))*24*60)))||'분전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') < to_char(regdate + 1, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'))*24)))||'시간전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd') < to_char(regdate + 7, 'yyyy/mm/dd') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')))))||'일전' else to_char(regdate, 'yyyy"년"MM"월"dd"일"') end regdate from ( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select b.bno, b.content, b.writer_id, b.regdate as regdate, l.regdate as l_regdate from board b, board_like l where b.bno = l.bno and like_id = #{id} and b.del_chk = 'N' order by l.regdate desc ) a where rownum <= (#{page}+1)*20) x where rnum > #{page}*20

select bno, content, writer_id, to_char(regdate, 'yyyy"년"MM"월"dd"일" am hh"시" mi"분"') regdate from board b, (select user_no, id from member) m where b.writer_id = m.user_no and bno = #{bno} and b.del_chk = 'N'
